The '''Monoceros Caeli Chapter''' is [[Tartaglia]]'s [[Story Quest]].

==Act I: Mighty Cyclops' Adventure!==
{{Main|Mighty Cyclops' Adventure!}}
{{Description|After whipping up quite the storm in [[Liyue]] not so long ago, [[Fatui Harbinger]] Childe seems to have been lying low for a while...<br />But a chance encounter with someone from the other side of the ocean is about to reunite the two of you in Liyue once again.<br />A warrior through and through, Childe is always looking out for a chance to throw himself into battle. But this time, you encounter him not as a warrior but as a guardian, one who will do whatever it takes to protect what he treasures most &mdash; even if it means having to use his [[Foul Legacy Transformation]] once again...}}
# [[Across the Sea]]
# [[Teucer's Terrific Tour]]
# [[Defender of Childhood Dreams]]
